info.name: ems-rest-test
info.description: Check EMS application for common use-cases

check access to project with cookie

exec: pm.test("logged-in user can access system", function () {

item.name: check access to project with invalid cookie

exec: pm.test("logged-out user cannot access system", function () {
pm.test('applicant can create project application', function() {
pm.test('applicant can upload file to project application', function() {

item.name: programme user cannot see list of files

exec: pm.test('programme user should not be able to see files when application is DRAFT', function() {
pm.test('programme user should not be able to upload file', function() {
pm.test('programme user should not be able to set description', function() {
pm.test('programme user should not be able to download file, when application is just DRAFT', function() {
pm.test('applicant can create project application', function() {
pm.test('application should not have submission date filled in', function() {
pm.test('applicant can upload file to project application', function() {
pm.test('applicant can submit his application', function() {
pm.test('applicant should not be able to upload file to SUBMITTED application', function() {
pm.test('programme user can be created', function() {

item.name: programme user can see list of files

exec: pm.test('programme user can see files, when application is SUBMITTED', function() {
pm.test('program user can return application back to user', function() {
pm.test('status of project is set to RETURNED_TO_APPLICANT', function() {
pm.test('status change is assigned to program user who triggered change', function() {
pm.test('program user should not be able to resubmit application', function() {

item.name: applicant cannot RE-submit to status SUBMIT

exec: pm.test('applicant can only re-submit to RESUBMITTED', function() {
